channel.title: Production guidance on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Production guidance on FinanClub

item.title: LCID
item.description: score:20 Chances: Lucid announces plans for Gravity SUV reveal in November, potentially boosting interest. Lucid’s Air EV price cuts are well received by the market, indicating positive response. Lucid remains on track for annual production guidance of over 10,000 vehicles. Lucid strikes EV technology deal with Aston Martin, leading to partnership and stock jump.

item.title: CTRA
item.description: score:-1 Chances: Outstanding operational execution and production beat. Positive stock performance with a significant 11% increase. Increase in production guidance for 2023. Projected fair value analysis indicating potential. Retirement of two Executive Officers in the company. Risks: Uncertainty due to conflicting market indicators.
